description: This Asian-style rice dish has it all â€“ big flavour, low saturated fat, an easy-to-follow recipe and it's on the table in 20 minutes.
name: Tuna & Cauliflower Rice Goreng Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g green beans, cut into 3cm lengths, blanched
425g can tuna in spring water, drained, flaked
5ml extra virgin olive oil cooking spray

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Crack eggs into pan. Cook for 2 minutes for a soft yolk or until cooked to your liking. Transfer onto a plate.

Spray onion with oil. Add to pan. Cook, stirring, for 2 minutes. Add garlic. Cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant. Spray capsicum and beans with oil. Add to pan. Cook, stirring, for 2 minutes. Add rice and tuna. Cook, stirring, for 2 minutes or until heated and vegetables are tender.
Add tamari and sambal to pan. Cook, stirring, for 30 seconds or until combined.
Add half the sprouts and coriander. Toss to combine. Spoon into serving bowls. Top with remaining sprouts and coriander. Top with an egg. Sprinkle with shallots. Serve with cucumber.
